markdownRemark.html:
Email us or contact us through our FB group for meeting links. Leaders can also be reached via our Facebook page.

For families in or near Natomas, please visit the LLL of Natomas page.

meetings.name: On Zoom and in-person for the time being and subject to change
meetings.time: On the second Tuesday at 6pm on Zoom and third Thursdays at 10am of the month
